snippet: A three-judge federal appeals court panel ruled that the federal government can refuse to renew the lease of Drake’s Bay Oyster Company.
abstract: Operators of Drake's Bay Oyster company are looking for a way forward after three-judge federal appeals court panel rules 2 to 1 that the federal government can refuse to renew the lease of the oyster farm, which has operated for decades within the boundaries of Point Reyes National Seashore.
lead_paragraph: A three-judge federal appeals court panel ruled that the federal government can refuse to renew the lease of Drake’s Bay Oyster Company.

headline.main: California: Court Rules Against Oyster Company
headline.print_headline: California: Court Rules Against Oyster Company
